docs.text: End to End Test Suite HELLO WORLD NEW Choose one Jan Feb ... Oct Nov Dec function end_to_end_write(){ //month = document.getElementById('month').value; alert("hello world"); const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); alert("after xhr new"); //const url = `https://api.github.com/users/bobbeck55/repos`; //const url = `https://api.github.com/repos/bobbeck55/bobbeck55.github.io`; //const url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobbeck55/bobbeck55.github.io/master/transcriber/test_suites/index.html'; const url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobbeck55/bobbeck55.github.io/master/static_site_state.txt'; var auth="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"; var headers = @{"Accept"="application/vnd.github.v3+json"; "Authorization"="token ${auth}"}; var payload = @{ "ref"="refs/heads/master"; "inputs" =@{ "vmSku"="Standard_B2ms"; "vmCount"=3; } }; var body = ${payload} | ConvertTo-Json; alert("after url"); xhr.open('PUT', url, true); alert("after open"); var data = {}; data.firstname = "John2"; data.lastname = "Snow2"; var json = JSON.stringify(data); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-type','application/json; charset=utf-8'); xhr.onload = function () { alert("onload function"); var users = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText); if (xhr.readyState == 4 && xhr.status == "200") { console.table(users); } else { console.error(users); } } alert("after onload"); xhr.send(json); alert("after send"); } function end_to_end_read(){ //month = document.getElementById('month').value; alert("hello world"); const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); alert("after xhr new"); //const url = `https://api.github.com/users/bobbeck55/repos`; //const url = `https://api.github.com/repos/bobbeck55/bobbeck55.github.io`; //const url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobbeck55/bobbeck55.github.io/master/transcriber/test_suites/index.html'; const url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobbeck55/bobbeck55.github.io/master/index.html'; alert("after url"); xhr.open('GET', url, true); alert("after open"); xhr.onload = function() { alert("onload function"); // Parse API data into JSON const data = JSON.parse(this.response); alert("after json parse"); // Log the response for (let i in data) { str = "repo: " + data[i].name; alert(str); str = "description: " + data[i].description; alert(str); str = "url: " + data[i].html_url; alert(str); } } alert("after onload"); xhr.send(); alert("after send"); }
